member.name: Generator
member.summary: Represents a class for generating IDs

member.name: GenerateId
member.summary: Generates an ID based on the employee's first and last names, as well as their hire date.
member.returns: A string representing the generated ID.
member.exception: is null. -or-3 is null. -or- is in the past.

member.name: GeneratePassword
member.summary: Generates Password Randoomly with the length you want.
member.returns: A string representing the generated Password.
